document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Studied material: Sirch. 2014 (Prov. of Kerman)
Studied material: Khirood forest, 2012 (Prov. of Mazandaran), Mahan, 2014 (Prov. of Kerman).
Studied material: Khirood forest, 2012 (Prov. of Mazandaran). Citations: Without exact locality (Hieke & Wrase, 1988 ).
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Damavand, 2600 m . 2008 (Prov. of Tehran), NowShahr, 2008 (Prov. of Mazandaran) and Bandar-e Anzali, 2008 (Prov. of Gilan).
= amator Reitter, 1900

Citations:
Mandl ( 1963 )
cited the species from Kuh-räng, 2500 m (Prov. of Esfahan) but this record is dubious as in the last Palearctic catalogue.

Harpalus ( Harpalus ) cupreus fastuosus Faldermann, 1836 Citations
: Without exact locality (
Kataev & Wrase, 2003
).
Studied material: Kermanshah C., 2014 . (prov, of Kermanshah); ( ZMTU ): Kordak River, 2008 (Prov. of Qazvin) and Hashtpar, 2012 (Prov. of Gilan).

Harpalus ( Harpalus ) fuscipalpis Sturm, 1818 Studied
material: Firooz Kola, 2010 (Prov. of Mazandaran). Citations:
New record for Iran .

Citations:
Samin et al. ( 2011 )
cited the species from Ahwaz (Prov. of Khuzestan), but this record is dubious because this species distributed in Northen countery of Iran and this record refer ro South of Iran .

Harpalus ( Harpalus ) luteicornis (Dufischmid, 1812 ) Citations
: Without exact locality (
Gueorguiev, 1995
).

Harpalus ( Harpalus ) reflexus anadoluensis Kataev, 1993 Citations
: North west of Iran (Kataev, 1993 ).

Studied material: Kolijak, 1600-1850 m (Prov. of Mazandaran). Citations:
New record for Iran .

Harpalus ( Harpalus ) serripes serripes
(Quensel in Schonherr, 1806 )
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Shemshak, 2008 (Prov. of Tehran), Kandovan, 2008 (Prov. of Mazandaran) and Harunie, 2012 (Prov. of Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari).

Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Dohezar River and Javaher
Deh, 2008
(Prov. of Mazandaran) and Astaneh, 2012 (Prov. of Gilan).

Citations: Quchan,
37 ° 23 ´N
,
58 ° 35 ´E
, 1921 m (Prov. of Razavi Khorasan;
Kataev, 2015
).
